title: The 2000 Florida Ballot: An Election Lost by Design
description: A short lesson to help you apply The 2000 Florida Ballot: An Election Lost by Design.

hook.text: In 2000, a confusing ballot in Palm Beach County may have changed who became US president.

buildup.text: Palm Beach County used a 'butterfly ballot' â€” candidates on both sides with punch holes in the middle.

discovery.text: The layout confused thousands of voters. Pat Buchanan received 3,407 votes â€” far above his expected 600.

twist.text: The ballot designer, Theresa LePore, was a Democrat trying to make the text bigger for elderly voters.

climax.text: A well-intentioned design decision may have determined who became President of the United States.

punchline.text: Bad design doesn't just frustrate users. Sometimes it changes history.

quiz.question: What was wrong with the 2000 Florida butterfly ballot?
options: The layout confused voters, causing thousands to vote for the wrong candidate
